name: Anatolia Solutions LLC
slogan: Illuminating the hidden side of software through our journey
html_desc: Anatolia Solutions is a software company that provides special training, consultancy services and products.
vision: We build software that empowers human potential and strengthens communities. Technology should empower, not exploit. We're not just building software. We're building the backbone of a better civilization. In an era of declining institutional trust, we believe civilized society must unite around shared values and mutual development, and we're committed to building the technological foundation that makes this vision real.
